posts.post_content:
Fifteen HOFs for sale. Will also take offers on individual cards. Check out following scans. PMs will get to me the quickest. First come first serve. Lot includes two Cy Youngs, Ty Cobb, Christy Mathewson, Walter Johnson and a H.R Baker with an AB back as well as others in scans.
Front Scan:
[URL=http://s1365.photobucket.com/user/gorehawg/media/hoffrontt206_zps51948d1c.png.html][IMG]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r747/gorehawg/hoffrontt206_zps51948d1c.png[/IMG][/URL]

Back Scan:
[URL=http://s1365.photobucket.com/user/gorehawg/media/hofbackt206_zps56dba69d.png.html][IMG]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r747/gorehawg/hofbackt206_zps56dba69d.png[/IMG][/URL]

I'm interested in the lesser known names as a lot. I'd like to discuss price minus the four big names.

Jeff
